metadata.title: CVE-2024-6239 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Poppler's Pdfinfo utility. This issue occurs whenusing -dests parameter with pdfinfo utility. By using certain malformedinput files, an attacker could cause the utility to crash, leading to adenial of service.

criterions.comment: poppler package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
